sections.TOP: Grand Maester05254o7gm89j3bhfhb4c2w4wtel5jmih3v4s1761062015-03-10T03:58:12ZSharp Blades26158496'''Grand Maester''' is a title in ''[[Game of Thrones]]''. The Grand Maester is the personal [[Maesters|maester]] to the [[Iron Throne]] and the [[Red Keep]], and is considered the most senior member of the Order of Maesters. He is a learned man wise in history, science and medicine who also provides counsel. The Grand Maester sits on the King's [[Small Council]], which oversees the day-to-day operations of the [[Seven Kingdoms|realm]] in the name of the [[King of the Andals and the First Men|King]].
sections.Known Grand Maesters:
* [[Malleon]], author of ''[[The Lineages and Histories of the Great Houses of the Seven Kingdoms]]''. In office about ninety years ago.
* [[Kaeth]], author of ''[[Lives of Four Kings]]''. Also in office around ninety years ago, perhaps somewhat later.
* [[Pycelle]], Grand Maester during the rules of [[Aerys II Targaryen|Aerys II]], [[Robert Baratheon|Robert I]], [[Joffrey Baratheon|Joffrey I]] and [[Tommen Baratheon|Tommen I]]. At the death of King Robert, Pycelle has been Grand Maester for over forty years, an unusually long tenure as he was selected at a relatively young age.
